summary: This bill, the Coast Guard Combat-Injured Tax Fairness Act, amends the Combat-Injured Veterans Tax Fairness Act of 2016 to include members of the Coast Guard when it is not operating as a service in the Department of the Navy. It addresses the improper withholding of taxes from severance payments to Coast Guard veterans with combat-related injuries, specifying the roles of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Secretary of Transportation in implementing the act's provisions regarding identification and restoration of withheld amounts.
